# configuration

**Instance Property**

The current configuration of the session.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var configuration: AEAssessmentConfiguration { get }
```

## Discussion

You configure a session when you create it with the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/init(configuration:)] initializer. You can later change the configuration by calling the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/update(to:)] method. Read the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentSession/configuration] property to obtain the session’s current configuration.

## Managing session configuration

- **update(to:)**: Changes the session to use the specified configuration.
- **supportsMultipleParticipants**: A Boolean that indicates whether the current device or platform supports a configuration with one or more participant applications.
- **supportsConfigurationUpdates**: A Boolean that indicates whether the current device or platform supports updating a session’s configuration after the session has begun.
